quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hands
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hands
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hands
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: A good book is a creator of inwardness
author: Susan Sontag

quote: I have always imagined paradise will be a kind of library
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Books are the training weights of the mind
author: Epictetus

quote: Any book not worth rereading isn’t worth reading
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: Books let us into their souls and lay open to us the secrets of our own
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Most of what makes a book ‘good’ is that we are reading it at the right moment for us
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Buying books would be a good thing if one could also buy the time to read them in
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The poet lights the light and fades away
But the light goes on and on
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The greatest books have more insights than one can absorb in a single reading
author: James Pierce

quote: Stories are illusion
They are so powerful they invite delusion
author: Stewart Brand

quote: Knowledge sets us free, art sets us free
A great library is freedom
Ursula K
author: Le Guin

quote: That is a good book it seems to me, which is opened with expectation and closed with profit
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: The only important thing in a book is the meaning that it has for you
W
author: Somerset Maugham

quote: If we encounter a man of rare intellect, we should ask him what books he reads
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A book is proof that humans are capable of working magic
author: Carl Sagan

quote: In a good book the best is between the lines
author: Swedish proverb

quote: All great literature is one of two stories; a man goes on a journey or a stranger comes to town
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Readers are plentiful, thinkers are rare
author: Harriet Martineau

quote: Many a book is like a key to unknown chambers within the castle of one’s own self
author: Franz Kafka

quote: One kind of good book should leave you asking: how did the author know that about me?
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Bad reading: when you rush through
Good reading: when you go slow
Wise reading: when you understand
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: The very greatest books only manage to illuminate the dark confusion of our lives like a brief brilliant firework
author: Alain de Botton

quote: In the case of good books, the point is not how many of them you can get through, but rather how many can get through to you
Mortimer J
author: Adler

quote: A book is something that can be read ten years after publication
A real book, twenty
Otherwise it is a magazine report with bookbinding
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: Let just as many books be acquired as are enough, but none for mere show
author: Seneca

quote: Of all that is written, I love only what a man has written with his own blood
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: As a rule the purchase of books is mistaken for the appropriation of their contents
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: We’ve already discovered teleportation and time travel: a good book
author: Sahil Lavingia

quote: I was dumb
I thought reading the classics would make me wise and educated
Now, I simply read the books that interest me
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: Part 1
Books are the carriers of civilization
Without books, history is silent, literature dumb, science crippled, thought and speculation at a standstill
author: Barbara Tuchman

quote: Part 2
They are engines of change, windows on the world and lighthouses erected in the sea of time
They are companions, teachers, magicians, bankers of the treasures of the mind
Books are humanity in print
author: Barbara Tuchman

quote: People who ask for book recommendations don’t read
author: Sahil Lavingia

quote: Great books teach you something every time you read them
author: Angela Jiang

quote: Beware of the person of one book
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Books are not made for furniture, but there is nothing else that so beautifully furnishes a house
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: A house is no home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as for the body
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: I would rather read the 100 best books over and over again until I absorbed them, rather than read all the books
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The right book at the right time will speak to you in a way the right book at the wrong time just won’t
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: My library is an archive of longings
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life
author: Mark Twain

quote: So many books, so little time
author: Frank Zappa

quote: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If a book is well written, I always find it too short
author: Jane Austen

quote: The dearest ones of time, the strongest friends of the soul – books
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: ′Classic′ – a book which people praise and don’t read
author: Mark Twain

quote: I was raised by books
Books, and then my parents
author: Elon Musk

quote: Independent inquiry is needed in your search for truth, not dependence on anyone else’s view or a mere book
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know
The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go
Dr
author: Seuss

quote: A children’s story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children’s story in the slightest
C
S
author: Lewis

quote: There is no friend as loyal as a book
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I was with book, as a woman is with child
C
S
author: Lewis (Till We Have Faces, Amazon book)

quote: Your face is a book, where men may read strange matters
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Literature and butterflies are the two sweetest passions known to man
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Throw away your books; stop letting yourself be distracted
author: Marcus Aurelius (It seems Marcus Aurelius was not a dreamer…)

quote: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: It is my ambition to say in ten sentences what others say in a whole book
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: One always tends to overpraise a long book, because one has got through it
E
M
author: Forster

quote: Anyone who reads a book with a sense of obligation does not understand the art of reading
author: Lin Yutang (The Importance of Living, Amazon book)

quote: There are two motives for reading a book: one, that you enjoy it; the other, that you can boast about it
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Sleep is good, he said, and books are better
George R
R
author: Martin

quote: A lawyer without books would be like a workman without tools
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A book worth reading is worth buying
author: John Ruskin

quote: Some books leave us free and some books make us free
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I water my mind with books
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Words are life
author: Markus Zusak (The Book Thief, Amazon book)

quote: Books are absent teachers
Mortimer J
author: Adler

quote: When I had nothing, I had books
author: Jola Tankoka

quote: Read more books and fewer articles
author: Morgan Housel

quote: Books are a uniquely portable magic
author: Stephen King

quote: Your brain is a muscle and books are the weights
author: James Clear

quote: Books may well be the only true magic
author: Alice Hoffman

quote: No two persons ever read the same book
author: Edmund Wilson

quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul
author: Cicero

quote: Good books don’t give up all their secrets at once
author: Stephen King

quote: I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library
author: Jane Austen

quote: Books have superpowers; they ground you and make you fly too
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need
author: Cicero

quote: Even a great book is not so great if the current you is not ready
author: @orangebook_

quote: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: There is no frigate like a book to take us lands away
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: It is the nature of those books we call classics to wait patiently on the shelf for us to grow into them
author: Erica Jong

quote: Whenever you read a good book, somewhere in the world a door opens to allow in more light
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: The test of literature is, I suppose, whether we ourselves live more intensely for the reading of it
author: Elizabeth Drew

quote: Don’t read to show off, read to take off
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: My library serves as a visual reminder of what I don’t know
author: Shane Parrish

quote: That’s the thing about books
They let you travel without moving your feet
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: There is no better teacher than history in determining the future
There are answers worth billions of dollars in a $30 history book
author: Charlie Munger

quote: A book lying idle on a shelf is wasted ammunition
Like money, books must be kept in constant circulation
Lend and borrow to the maximum – of both books and money! But especially books, for books represent infinitely more than money
A book is not only a friend, it makes friends for you
When you have possessed a book with mind and spirit, you are enriched
But when you pass it on you are enriched threefold
author: Henry Miller

quote: Books are funny little portable pieces of thought
author: Susan Sontag

quote: Books are gateways into other worlds and other minds into which you cannot otherwise travel
author: Unknown

quote: I’ll never forgive books for being 300 pages when they could have been 30
author: Unknown

quote: Think how quiet a book is on a shelf, just sitting there, unopened
Then think what happens when you open it
author: Ali Smith

quote: Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed, and some few to be chewed on and digested
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Buying books isn’t spending, it’s investing
author: Sven Schnieders
